roleset.name: fight
roleset.note: BRAWL-V NOTES: Hand-corrected by Claire (from brawl.01-v)
BRAWL-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from brawl.01-n)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In 1461, when Howard was sheriff of Norfolk, he brawled with John Paston over elections to Parliament.
example.arg: when Howard was sheriff of Norfolk

example.name: Both brawlers in one constituent
example.text: They brawled about their work, and each in selfishness strove to shift his own appointed duty on some other one.
